question_sentence: Which country recently faced widespread unrest and travel disruptions following the death of a cartel leader?
evidence: Many US tourists were stranded in Mexico this week after a wave of violence erupted following the death of drug lord Nemesio “El Mencho” Oseguera.

question_sentence: President Donald Trump set a record Tuesday for the longest State of the Union address in US history. Roughly how long was his speech?
evidence: President Trump’s State of the Union address lasted 1 hour and 47 minutes. That beat his own record — which he set last year — for the longest address to Congress on record since at least 1964.

question_sentence: The Milan Cortina Olympics have officially concluded. Which country will host the next Winter Games in 2030?
evidence: The 2026 Winter Olympics concluded on February 22 with a grand closing ceremony in Verona, Italy. At the end of the show, the baton was passed to France, which will host the next Winter Games in 2030.

question_sentence: Which type of extreme weather impacted the Northeast this week?
evidence: The Northeast is reeling from a historic bomb cyclone that swept the region overnight Sunday and throughout Monday, dumping more than two feet of snow across several states.

question_sentence: How many years has it been since Russia launched its full-scale invasion of Ukraine?
evidence: Ukraine on Tuesday marked four years since Russia launched its invasion, a somber milestone in a war with no clear end in sight.

question_sentence: Which government program was briefly announced as being suspended before officials backtracked?
evidence: The Department of Homeland Security reversed its decision to suspend the TSA's PreCheck program after initially causing confusion by announcing a temporary halt.

question_sentence: Where did the 2026 BAFTA awards take place this week?
evidence: The 2026 BAFTA Film Awards — Britain's equivalent of the Oscars — recently took place in London.

question_sentence: What is the name of the moon mission that NASA delayed this week?
evidence: Efforts to get NASA’s historic moon journey off the ground have stalled once again as engineers navigate a new problem with the rocket. The space agency is now targeting no earlier than April to launch Artemis II.

question_sentence: How many moons does Saturn have?
evidence: Saturn has 274 moons, far more than any other planet in our solar system. Scientists recently said they unlocked key insights about Saturn’s largest moon, Titan, including how it came to be.

question_sentence: The world's largest coral colony was recently discovered off the coast of which country?
evidence: A mother-and-daughter team of scientists has identified the world's largest known coral colony, found on the Great Barrier Reef off the coast of Australia.
